author: smuzaffar
body:
Applying code format changes suggested by LLVM 14 ( which we want to integrate in cmssw once fully testing in CLANG IBs).
Mostly these changes are suggested by improved [performance-unnecessary-copy-initialization](https://releases.llvm.org/14.0.0/tools/clang/tools/extra/docs/clang-tidy/checks/performance-unnecessary-copy-initialization.html) check.
title: [RECONSTRUCTION] [LLVM14] Apply code checks
